message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can negotiate further if you prefer.
I'm not greedy, but I think I deserve more than 10%.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 60/40.  We're both losing money with each round, so let's find a solution that works for both of us.
I'm not sure why you're being so generous, but I'll take it. Let's hope you're not just trying to lull me into a false sense of security.
